original_text: All the officers and the people agreed with the king that they would do this. They would not continue to have male or female slaves. They let them go free, as they had promised.
korean_text: 이 계약에 가담한 고관들과 모든 백성이 각기 노비를 자유롭게 하고 다시는 종을 삼지 말라 함을 듣고 순복하여 놓았더니

sentences.original_text: All the officers and the people agreed with the king
They would not continue to have male or female slaves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 남녀 노예를 두지 않을 것입니다
